summary: REQ-1/2/3 appear largely implemented (welcome screen with form + local preview, backend status query and rendering, and a warm non-blue/purple theme). However, the diff introduces Internet Identity authentication scaffolding despite it being a stated non-goal.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication integration/scaffolding (provider + hook usage) even though authentication integration was explicitly a non-goal.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest non-goals explicitly exclude Internet Identity integration, but the diff adds an InternetIdentityProvider and hooks that create authenticated/anonymous actors based on II identity.
